hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“Fadl bin ‘Abbas said: ‘I was riding behind the Prophet (ﷺ) and I continued to hear him reciting the Talbiyah until he stoned ‘Aqabah Pillar, and when he stoned it, he stopped reciting the Talbiyah.’”

chapter.eng-name: When the pilgrim should stop reciting the Talbiyah
